tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE drug_development_progress (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  phase1_start_date DATE,
  phase1_end_date DATE,
  phase2_start_date DATE,
  phase2_end_date DATE,
  phase3_start_date DATE,
  phase3_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DrugProgress (
  drug_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  development_phase VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  phase_timeline TIMESTAMP,
  progress_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectManagement (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  project_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE project_timeline (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  phase_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (phase_id) REFERENCES drug_phases(phase_id)
);

CREATE TABLE drug_progress (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    development_phase VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE project_timeline (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    phase_completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE team_members (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    specialization VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    project_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE project_tasks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    assigned_to INT NOT NULL,
    deadline DATE NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE DrugDevelopmentProjects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, status ENUM('Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Completed'))

CREATE TABLE DevelopmentPhases (phase_id INT PRIMARY KEY, phase_name VARCHAR(255), duration_in_weeks INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, project_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES DrugDevelopmentProjects(project_id))

CREATE TABLE PhaseTasks (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, status ENUM('Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Completed'), phase_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (phase_id) REFERENCES DevelopmentPhases(phase_id))
CREATE TABLE TaskAssignments (assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, assignee_name VARCHAR(255), assignment_date DATE, task_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES PhaseTasks(task_id))
CREATE TABLE TaskComments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, comment_text TEXT, commenter_name VARCHAR(255), comment_date DATE, task_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES PhaseTasks(task_id))
